title: Why have you deleted my order history?
content:
Google Pixel 4XL - Battery/Charging issue (Purchased May 5, 2020. I have the order number) 

Have gone through FastBoot, Restore, Wipe, but the battery (50% when on and will not charge, turns off randomly, battery exhausted, etc.) issue continues. Now at the point where the 4XL will not turn on or stay on long enough to be used.
Google deleted the order history, luckily I have the emails. I'm a lot peaved about that. 
What are my next steps? Obviously, Google will not support it under Preferred Care since they've deleted any record of it. Do I have to go to UFixIT? 
Is there any ethics or accountability that I can rely on at Google?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
